abstract: Add menu items to open immersive spaces from a media player’s environment picker.

declaration.code: nonisolated func immersiveEnvironmentPicker<Content>(@ViewBuilder content: () -> Content) -> some View where Content : View

overview:
## Discussion

These items are added alongside recently used system environments.

Use a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/UIViewControllerRepresentable] instance to display a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVKit/AVPlayerViewController] class in your SwiftUI interface.

Items will be donated to media players (like [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVKit/AVPlayerViewController]) downstream in the hierarchy.
